channel.title: Monkey See, Monkey Do - ICS [DnB, Jungle]
channel.description:
![Monkey%20See%2C%20Monkey%20Do|500x500](upload://jO6ZqiQEUrG0H3H3cqOzq4D0kB5.jpg) [Monkey See, Monkey Do](https://soundcloud.com/icsleepers/monkey-see-monkey-do)
Hot on the tails of Capzuul I present "Monkey See, Monkey Do"
Was actually working on this in tandem with Capzuul.
Some fun facts:
1. This is the most amount of samples I've used in an Auxy track (23). 2. The artwork is care of my son, a school project. I'll be honest, it terrified/terrifies me and was the inspiration for this piece. 3. I used Auxy, Blocs Wave, Garageband iOS, ReSlice and Grand Finale to put it all together.
As always, feedback welcome. Like any other track if anyone desires to remix etc I will make all files and samples available. Thanks!

item.title: Monkey See, Monkey Do - ICS [DnB, Jungle]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Monkey See, Monkey Do

Hot on the tails of Capzuul I present “Monkey See, Monkey Do”

Was actually working on this in tandem with Capzuul.

Some fun facts:

  1. This is the most amount of samples I’ve used in an Auxy track (23).
  2. The artwork is care of my son, a school project. I’ll be honest, it terrified/terrifies me and was the inspiration for this piece.
  3. I used Auxy, Blocs Wave, Garageband iOS, ReSlice and Grand Finale to put it all together.

As always, feedback welcome. Like any other track if anyone desires to remix etc I will make all files and samples available. Thanks!
